extendedIngredients.name: cabbage
extendedIngredients.original: 1 3-pound head of red cabbage—cored and sliced 1/4 inch thick
extendedIngredients.originalName: red cabbage—cored and sliced 1/4 inch thick

title: Braised Red Cabbage
summary: Braised Red Cabbage might be just the side dish you are searching for. Watching your figure? This caveman, gluten free, primal, and fodmap friendly recipe has 206 calories, 4g of protein, and 14g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 4 and costs 74 cents per serving. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. If you have cabbage—cored and 1, pepper, salt and pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 20 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 86%. This score is spectacular. Try Spiralized Red Cabbage Kohlrabi Slaw with Cilantro Vinaigrette, Guinness Braised Short Rib Tacos with Guinness Braised Cabbage, and Braised Red Cabbage for similar recipes.
instructions: In a medium enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the olive oil. Add the red cabbage and cook over moderately high heat, stirring, until sizzling, about 3 minutes. Cover tightly and cook over moderate heat,  stirring occasionally, until just tender, about 6 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice and crushed red pepper. Season with salt and pepper and serve.

steps.step: In a medium enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the olive oil.

Add the red cabbage and cook over moderately high heat, stirring, until sizzling, about 3 minutes. Cover tightly and cook over moderate heat,  stirring occasionally, until just tender, about 6 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice and crushed red pepper. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
